website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable alternative seating that keeps kids active and engaged.
pros: Collapsible legs allow kids to bounce while they sit and prevent the ball from rolling away once they stand up
Available in multiple colors and sizes
Comfortable chairs help to combat boredom, anxiety, and keep kids focused throughout the day
cons: With an 18- and a 20-inch option, this chair is a little on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Sized for a 3-5 year old child
customer_reviews.text: These are a little too small to fit my 3rd graders. When fully inflated, it barely fit held a petite 6 year old child. I do like that the little "legs" hold the ball in place when inflated, which prevents it from rolling around.
customer_reviews.author: Teach3

customer_reviews.title: Great product and helps our son.
customer_reviews.text: Our 6yr old was having some issues with focusing in school and we have enrolled in school that helps with these issues. We were told to try a device like this to help get the wiggles out while he sits and does homework. We use it nightly and it really does help him focus. My 3 yr old love bouncing on it as well. We are glad we made the purchase. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: jtstang

customer_reviews.title: but legs collapse easily when sitting on it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lived this for a K-2 classroom. The ball doesn’t roll away, but legs collapse easily when sitting on it. Perfect for this wiggly students who need a way to release energy while working. I have one student who bounces on this all day every day. I went back and bought another one. Price was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Veith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflat
customer_reviews.text: The ball is being used for my seven-year-old son virtual schooling and he sometimes has problem sitting still hoping this will work ...so far thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Shell-dale

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching
customer_reviews.text: A few things...1st this is way small, id day for a toddle. But also the feet don’t hold. It just smashes to the ground. Lastly the pump is awful so plan on using a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.text: My children love these balls for television and gaming, but during homework time one lost air. Can't find the hole to patch it.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: My kids are obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these balls! We got this and the yellow peanut one. Big hits for our 2 and 4 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small. Not your average size yoga ball. Still works for my students though.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Virtual school
customer_reviews.text: This ball has been a game changer for my children that are doing virtual school this year. It is helpful for the one that has ADHD to stay focused. They were easy to set up/ blow up. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my classroom and we were happy at first. Been using them since the beginning of the school year and 2 of them popped while my students are sitting on them. They split right on the seam. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flexible seating for my boys virtual learning!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kinder and 2nd grader, and it has been awesome for when they get antsy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam R

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Yess works as advertised and it is made of good quality
customer_reviews.author: Christina Morris

customer_reviews.title: Love idea, but so small
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea, I have an ADHD kid and something like this is definitely ideal for him, but the ball was too small for him and I just really don't want to deflate, repackage and etc. For return.
customer_reviews.author: evieey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate and fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to inflate with the pump it comes with. The kids love the stability ball seats. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Coram

customer_reviews.title: Much better than a hard chair and helps to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my almost 7 year old to sit on while doing school work. Much better than a hard chair and helps to get the wiggles out
customer_reviews.author: Rowina

customer_reviews.title: Great for high-energy children
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my students but need to refill to keep the legs on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd graders really like these alternative seats in my classroom. They have held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: J&W in California

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my son to use while doing his online schooling.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett & Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Way tooooooo small for my classroom.
customer_reviews.text: Although the description says "18 for this product, the picture was somewhat deceiving. I assumed this chair would be a great addition to my 2nd grade classroom seating. This particular chair is tiny, perhaps small toddler size. My husband laughed after these were blown up and I told him they were for seats. If they hadn't been purchased with a school #PO, I would return. If you are buying for school age children, perhaps buy a different size, not the "18!
customer_reviews.author: Mtc

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this ball but I found it too small, I contact Waliki Customer Service and they fix everything for me and very quick. I received the new size it is pretty good. Kids love to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WALIKI Chair Ball with Feet for Kids | Alternative Classroom Seating | Balance Ball | 18"/45CM Gray
product_meta.description:
Waliki Toys Chair Ball with legs for children

ORGANIZED AND TIDY: 
While seating the legs fold and don’t offer any resistance, allowing students to calmly release their extra energy, and strengthen their core. But when the children stand up (after the bell rings), the Chair Ball's feet will keep it from rolling away, helping maintain a clean and tidy classroom or homework area.

ALTERNATIVE CLASSROOM SEATING: 
Waliki’s Stability ball chair is designed for teachers in need of Flexible Classroom Seating to engage high-energy students, helping them concentrate and maintain a healthy posture

TWO SIZES & TWO USES: 
The Exercise Ball with Feet for kids comes in two sizes. 18”/45CM for ages 3-5, and 20”/50CM for ages 8-12. Inflation will determine the final size, enabling students or kids at home to find their perfect fit. Time to reward them? Turn the ball over, grab two handles, and it doubles as a Hopper Ball!

DURABLE: 
WALIKI’S Balance Ball Seat comes with a 1 year warranty, so schools and parents can rest assured their investment will outlast the school year. Pump Included
feature_bullets: FOCUSED: When seating the legs fold out of the way, allowing students to release energy and focus
ORGANIZED: When they stand up the legs stop it from rolling away, keeping a tidy Flexible Classroom
DOUBLE USE: To reward students turn over the Exercise Ball with Feet, grab two legs, and it becomes a Hop Ball!
ALTERNATIVE CLASSROOM SEATING: Stability Ball Chairs are for creative teachers of high-energy students
1 YEAR WARRANTY: Teachers & parents know their Balance Ball Seat investment will outlast the school year

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars50 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
